para.text: A record readable as text not executed in compliance with § 18-905(a) is deemed to comply with § 18-905(a) if the proponent of the record establishes by clear and convincing evidence that the decedent intended the record to be:
A partial or complete revocation of the decedent's will;
An addition to or modification of the decedent's will; or
A partial or complete revival of the decedent's formerly revoked will or part of the will.
